TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23DB+test.tds.ie+Visitor-dev%2C+Trunkselect 'google_spreadsheet_1' setting_name, safe_enc_toolkit.decrypt(setting_value) setting_value, setting_value as setting_value_capital from safe_qr_configurations where setting_name in ('google_spreadsheet_developer_key') union select 'google_spreadsheet_2' setting_name, safe_enc_toolkit.decrypt(setting_value) setting_value, setting_value as setting_value_capital from safe_qr_configurations where setting_name in ('google_spreadsheet_client_id') union select 'google_spreadsheet_3' setting_name, safe_enc_toolkit.decrypt(setting_value) setting_value, setting_value as setting_value_capital from safe_qr_configurations where setting_name in ('google_spreadsheet_app_id') union select trim(lower(sqc.setting_name)) as setting_name, sqc.setting_value as setting_value, sqc.setting_value as setting_value_capital from safe_qr_configurations sqc where sqc.setting_value is not null and sqc.setting_name not in ('google_spreadsheet_developer_key', 'google_spreadsheet_client_id', 'google_spreadsheet_app_id') and safe_request_permissions_pak.check_permission_sql ( :Uidtoken, '(quickregistermenu)(visitorviewmenu)(guestDashboard)(visitoractionmenu)', 'qrConfigurations', 'GET' ) = 'Y'
